title: Protein Pancakes
description: Oats, banana, egg whites, and protein powder. The kids love these too â€” weekend breakfast that doesn't derail you.
ingredients: Cooking spray or butter for pan
Toppings: berries, maple syrup, peanut butter
steps: Blend oats, banana, egg whites, protein powder, milk, baking powder, and vanilla in a blender until smooth.
Heat a non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat and spray with cooking spray.
Pour about 1/4 cup batter per pancake.
Cook until bubbles form on surface, about 2-3 minutes, then flip.
Serve with berries, a drizzle of maple syrup, or a tablespoon of peanut butter.
